attributes.action: Call for a ceasefire in isreal-Palestine conflict
attributes.background: Withdraw support for isreal and support palestine

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Call for an immediate ceasefire in Israel and Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649130

Withdraw support for Israel and support Palestine in Israel-Palestine conflict: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648456
